original_text: Wine was served in goblets of gold, each one different from the other, and the royal wine was abundant, in keeping with the king’s liberality.
korean_text: 금 잔으로 마시게 하니 잔의 모양이 각기 다르고 왕이 풍부하였으므로 어주가 한이 없으며

sentences.original_text: Wine was served in goblets of gold,
each one different from the other,
and the royal wine was abundant,
in keeping with the king's liberality.
